original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business requirements and technical implementation, requiring a unique blend of business acumen and technical proficiency. As a key member of the team, you will be responsible for understanding complex business processes and translating them into effective system configurations that drive efficiency and accuracy. Your focus will be on developing new processes and solutions within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to quickly deliver innovative outcomes.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements, document them using techniques like user stories and process flows, and ensure clear understanding of needs
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within the [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, using tools like database queries, reporting, and data visualization
- Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, participating in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps
- Work collaboratively with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective technical solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to effectively liaise with stakeholders from diverse backgrounds
- Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in Java and SQL to develop and maintain system configurations

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with machine learning and artificial intelligence to drive innovative solutions within the vehicle configuration space
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies to support iterative development and continuous improvement

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a similar role, blending business and technical expertise
- Proven track record of successfully translating business requirements into technical configurations and solutions

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in the vehicle configuration industry, with a deep understanding of the associated business processes and challenges
- Familiarity with Agile project management and development methodologies

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend
- SQL and database querying tools
- Data visualization and reporting tools
- Agile project management tools

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with regular stakeholder interactions
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team to deliver high-quality configurations and solutions
- Willingness to adapt to changing business requirements and embrace a continuous improvement mindset

Role Overview:
This role is a critical component of our team, responsible for bridging the gap between business needs and technical implementation. As a technical configuration specialist, you will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect evolving business requirements and operate efficiently. Your focus will be on developing new processes and solutions within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging the power of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to drive innovation and streamline operations.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with cross-functional stakeholders to gather detailed business requirements, document them using techniques like user stories and process flows, and ensure clear understanding of needs
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within the [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and resolving configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, using tools like database queries, reporting, and data visualization
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) and collaborating with developers and IT support
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to ensure knowledge transfer and continuity
- Foster strong working relationships with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective technical solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to effectively liaise with stakeholders from diverse backgrounds
- Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in Java and SQL to develop and maintain system configurations

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with machine learning and artificial intelligence to drive innovative solutions within the vehicle configuration space
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies to support iterative development and continuous improvement

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a similar role, blending business and technical expertise
- Proven track record of successfully translating business requirements into technical configurations and solutions

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in the vehicle configuration industry, with a deep understanding of the associated business processes and challenges
- Familiarity with Agile project management and development methodologies

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend
- SQL and database querying tools
- Data visualization and reporting tools
- Agile project management tools

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with regular stakeholder interactions
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team to deliver high-quality configurations and solutions
- Willingness to adapt to changing business requirements and embrace a continuous improvement mindset
- Proactive approach to identifying and resolving configuration-related issues

This position blends business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex processes and translate them into effective system configurations. Your focus will be on developing new processes and solutions within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging the power of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to drive innovation and streamline operations.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements, document them using techniques like user stories and process flows, and ensure clear understanding of needs
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within the [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, using tools like database queries, reporting, and data visualization
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) and working closely with developers and IT support
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to ensure knowledge transfer and continuity
- Foster strong working relationships with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective technical solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to effectively liaise with stakeholders from diverse backgrounds
- Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences

- Experience working in the vehicle configuration industry, with a deep understanding of the associated business processes and challenges
- Familiarity with Agile project management and development methodologies

Tools & Technologies:

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with regular stakeholder interactions
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team to deliver high-quality configurations and solutions
